project_plan.name: Temperature Converter Command-Line Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line Python tool that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement functionality to convert Celsius to Fahrenheit and Kelvin
Implement functionality to convert Fahrenheit to Celsius and Kelvin
Implement functionality to convert Kelvin to Celsius and Fahrenheit
Create command-line interface to accept user input for temperature and desired output unit
Write tests for each of the conversion features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure accuracy and reliability
